com.immersion.uhl
Class IVTElement

java.lang.Object
  com.immersion.uhl.IVTElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
IVTMagSweepElement, IVTPeriodicElement, IVTRepeatElement, IVTWaveformElement
public class IVTElement
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for elements of a Timeline effect in an IVT buffer.

Method Detail

newIVTElement

public static IVTElement newIVTElement(int[] element)
Instantiates this IVT element according to the given parameters. This method is not intended to be called by client applications.

Parameters:
element - Parameters defining this IVT element.
Returns:
An instance of the appropriate subclass of IVTElement.

getType

public int getType()
Gets the type of this IVT element.

Returns:
Type of this IVT element, one of
  • ImmVibe.VIBE_ELEMTYPE_PERIODIC
  • ImmVibe.VIBE_ELEMTYPE_MAGSWEEP
  • ImmVibe.VIBE_ELEMTYPE_WAVEFORM
  • ImmVibe.VIBE_ELEMTYPE_REPEAT

setTime

public void setTime(int time)
Sets the time of this IVT element.

Parameters:
time - Time in milliseconds of this IVT element within the Timeline effect.

Gets the time of this IVT element.

Returns:
Time in milliseconds of this IVT element within the Timeline effect.
